text: Nimen yiqian de minzu--nu ha de zongzu, a de ren, sai mo de ren he tamen yihou de ren, zhiyou zhenzhu neng zhidao tamen--nandao zhe deng ren de xiaoxi meiyou lailin nimen ma? Tamen zu zhong de shizhe zhaoshi tamen xuduo mingzheng, dan tamen ba ziji de shouzhi charu kounei, shuo: Women biding buxin nimen suo feng de shiming, women duiyu nimen suo xuanchuan de shiqing, que shi zai shi ren bu'an di yihuo zhi zhong.
